argument.name: tablename
argument.description: The name of a table. The extension ".dbf" is assumed.

page.description: Returns the linking key given the name of a child table.
page.discussion: If the current table is the primary table in a set, LINK() returns the linking key value that relates it to the specified Child_Table_Name table.
page.example: link("INV_ITEM") -> P1001, if the value of the key that links the parent to the child table INV_ITEM is "P1001"
